description: A default roles group for all users which allows applying for, viewing, and managing a user's own accounts, cards, loans, and transactions

A role which allows a user to edit some fields of their own account transactions
A role which allows a user to edit allowed fields of their own loans
A role which allows a user to view their own account transactions
